name: Venit Mio Hotel
address: Avenida Embaixador Abelardo Bueno 2710, Rio de Janeiro 22775-040
description: Set in Rio de Janeiro, just in front of Barra Olympic Park, Venit Mio Hotel features free WiFi access and private parking. The hotel has an outdoor pool and views of the city, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant or a drink at the bar. All air-conditioned rooms come with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, iPod dock and also a coffee machine. Bathrooms are private and equipped with a bath or shower. For your comfort, you will find bath robes, slippers and free toiletries. At Venit Mio, you will find a 24-hour front desk, spa, sauna and also a business centre. Barra da Tijuca Beach is 8 km from Venit Mio Hotel, while Riocentro Convention Centre is 3 km away. Rio de Janeiro/Galeao International Airport is 30 km from the property.Read less

name: Venit Barra Hotel
address: Avenida Embaixador Abelardo Bueno 2710, Rio de Janeiro 22775-040
description: Boasting an outdoor swimming pool, Venit Barra Hotel offers accommodation in Barra da TIjuca district, Rio de Janeiro. The hotel offers a spa centre, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant or a drink at the bar. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Each room is fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a minibar and Bluetooth speakers. Guests will find a private bathroom with free toiletries. Besides a sun terrace, guests will also be provided with a fitness centre, a sauna and a 24-hour front desk at the property. Barra Olympic Park is 100 metres from Venit Barra Hotel, while Barra da Tijuca Beach is 12 km away. Rio de Janeiro/Galeao International Airport is 23 km from the property.Read less

name: Costao do Santinho Resort
description: This award-winning resort on Florianópolis´s Santinho Beach is surrounded by native forest and archaeological sites. It features 6 restaurants which 5 have all incluvise, and a luxury spa. Sports facilities include swimming pools, and tennis. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. The accommodation at Costao do Santinho Resort offers garden views or sea view, TV and ambiance music. Some rooms have a barbecue and all rooms have private parking. A children´s club organizes monitored activities. For guests of all ages, there are visits to the wildlife sanctuary Morro das Aranhas Mount. In addition, the resort hosts performances by popular Brazilian singers. The spa provides several choices for treatments, from detox to talassotherapy. Guests can have a relaxation massage or a hydromassage session. A beauty salon is available too. As for gastronomy, the casual Rancho do Pescador specializes in seafood recipes from the Azores and Santa Catarina, and Nossa Senhora Vitória features an international contemporary menu. Other options include Italian food, Japanese food and barbecue. The Rancho do Pescador is not part of the all inclusive. Costao do Santinho has been awarded as best beach resort in Brazil 7 times

name: Mercure Sao Paulo Vila Olimpia
address: Rua Santa Justina 210, Vila Olimpia, Sao Paulo
description: Mercure São Paulo Vila Olímpia offers an authentic experience for your business or leisure stay. Spacious rooms for couples, singles and families, with view, A/C, and free WIFI. Event rooms, pool, sauna, and gym. Some rooms have been converted into offices. The cozy La Forchetta outdoor restaurant includes a vegetable garden for Italian and Brazilian dishes. Enjoy our great wine menu at the bar area.accorhotels.com

name: Melia Brasil 21
address: Shs Quadra 6 - Bloco B, D E F- Asa Sul., Brasilia 70316-000
description: Offering a heated rooftop pool, gym and sauna, Meliá Brasil 21 is located between the Television Tower and Parque da Cidade, in Brasília. For extra care, the Meliá Brasil 21 hotel has a gym with more than 1000 m², for your best comfort. 5-star hotel known for premium service and exclusive amenities. We have room categories that perfectly fit what you are looking for, all have air conditioning, TV with streaming, work desk and minibar. Those who choose to book THE LEVEL room category at the Meliá Brasil 21 Hotel will enjoy a package that includes access to the Exclusive Lounge located on the 2nd floor. This lounge offers special amenities such as private check-in and check-out service, concierge assistance, availability of snacks throughout the day and a daily Happy Hour from 6:30 pm to 9:30 pm, among other benefits. The Norton Restaurant, located on the 2nd floor, specializes in meat and fish, with a wide selection of wines. We have the best location for those coming for work or pleasure, we are 13km from Brasília International Airport, 3.8 km from the National Congress, 600m from Pátio Brasil 21 Shopping, 550m from Venâncio Shopping and 400m from Parque da Cidade.

name: Brasil 21 Convention Affiliated by Meliá
description: Featuring 4-star accommodation, Brasil 21 Convention Affiliated by Meliá is situated in Brasilia, 1.8 km from Cultural Complex of the Republic and 2 km from Central Bank of Brazil. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi. The property has a year-round outdoor pool, fitness centre, sauna and garden. The rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Brasil 21 Convention Affiliated by Meliá features some rooms that have a balcony, and every room includes a kettle. At the accommodation rooms have bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes buffet, à la carte and continental options. Conjunto Nacional Mall is 1.4 km from Brasil 21 Convention Affiliated by Meliá, while Brasília Cathedral is 2.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Brasilia - Presidente Juscelino Kubitschek International Airport, 17 km from the hotel.

name: Swan Generation Porto Alegre
description: The Swan Generation Porto Alegre offers 4-star accommodation and is located within 10 minutes from the centre of Porto Alegre. Free WiFi is available. Moinhos de Ventos Park is 1.2 km away. The rooms at the Swan Generation Porto Alegre feature air-conditioned and include cable TV, as well as a microwave. Rooms also offer a pillow menu. Guests can enjoy a daily continental breakfast buffet with fresh breads and coffee at Swan Generation Porto Alegre's restaurant. The hotel supplies private parking on site. It is situated 1 km from Moinhos Shopping Mall and 5 km from Salgado Filho International Airport.
